name: Train of Thought (Mira Gale)
description:
Oh dear, it seems you've run out of your ADHD medication - manage your train of thought for as long as possible until it inevitably derails!

Click and drag to throw bad thoughts (red) off-screen, or drag good thoughts (green) to your train.

Left/Right or A/D to move your train left or right.

Up/Down or W/S to pick which junction path you take.
